pkgmetadata.longdescription: Part Information from the Registry of Standard Biological Parts // Provides an R interface to the Registry of Standard Biological Parts API maintained by the iGEM Foundation: https://igem.org/Main_Page. Facilitates retrieval of the part number, authorship, date of entry, url, short description, type, and sequence following the guidelines set forth at http://parts.igem.org/Registry_API/Guidelines. All Registry content falls under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/.
